ml.classifier.dt
Class GainCalculator

java.lang.Object
  ml.classifier.dt.GainCalculator

public class GainCalculator
extends java.lang.Object

A calculator specifically used to compute Gain, GainRatio and Entropy criteria for different data distribution.

Author:
Ping He, Xiaohua Xu

Method Detail

computeGain

public static float computeGain(float stateEntropy,
                                float[] branchDistribution,
                                float[][] classDistribution,
                                float unknownRatio)
Compute Gain for the specified data distribution

Parameters:
stateEntropy - the entropy of the data before it splits on an attribute
branchDistribution - the weight distribution of the data in different attribute branch values
classDistribution - the weight distribution of the data in different classes and different attribute branch values.
unknownRatio - the ratio of the missing data
Returns:
Gain value of the specified data distribution

computeStateEntropy

public static float computeStateEntropy(float[][] classDistribution,
                                        float knownWeight)
Compute Entropy of the specified data distribution

Parameters:
classDistribution - the weight distribution of the data in different classes and different attribute branch values.
knownWeight - the total weight of the known data
Returns:
Entropy of the specified data distribution

computeSplitInfo

                                     float totalWeight)
Compute splitInfo for the specified data distribution

Parameters:
branchDistribution - the weight distribution of the data in different attribute branch values
totalWeight - the total weight of the data
Returns:
splitInfo value of the data distribution

computeGainRatio

                                     float splitInfo,
                                     float minGain)
Compute GainRatio for the provided Gain and splitInfo value

Parameters:
gain - Gain of the data
splitInfo - splitInfo of the data
minGain - the threshold value as a valid Gain
Returns:
GainRatio of the data
